data.author: Penelope Douglas
data.quote: Acting like you dont care is not letting it go

data.author: Mik Everett
data.quote: If a writer falls in love with you, you can never die.

data.author: Nizar Qabbani
data.quote: Dont lose a woman that has seen your flaws and still loves you.

data.author: Edgar Allan Poe
data.quote: All suffering originates from craving, from attachment, from desire.

data.author: Will Smith
data.quote: Stop letting people who do so little for you control so much of your mind and emotions.

data.author: Paulo Coelho
data.quote: You dont have to explain your dreams, they belong to you.

data.author: Jason Myers
data.quote: Sometimes not telling people anything is a good thing.

data.author: Vincent van Gogh
data.quote: The more you love, the more you suffer.

data.author: Emily Giffin
data.quote: It always takes two. For relationships to work, for them to break apart, for them to be fixed.

data.author: Angelina Jolie
data.quote: Its better to have nobody than someone who is half there, or who doesnt want to be there.

data.author: Chris Brogan
data.quote: Dont settle. Dont finish crappy books. If you dont like the menu, leave the restaurant. If youre not on the right path, get off it.

data.author: John Green
data.quote: We all romanticize the people we adore.

data.author: Isak Dinesen
data.quote: The cure for anything is salt water. Sweat, tears or the ocean.

data.author: Mandy Hale
data.quote: Ten years from now, make sure you can say that you chose your life, you didnt settle for it.

data.author: Abraham Hicks
data.quote: People will love you. People will hate you. And none of it will have anything to do with you.

data.author: Tyler Kent White
data.quote: Never apologize for burning too brightly or collapsing into yourself every night. That is how galaxies are made.

data.author: Robert Brault
data.quote: Eventually soul mates meet, for they have the same hiding place.

data.author: Lemony Snicket
data.quote: Do the scary thing first, and get scared later.

data.author: Patrick Stump
data.quote: When you have a bad day, a really bad day, try and treat the world better than it treated you.

data.author: Andrea Gibson
data.quote: You are not weak just because your heart feels so heavy.
